about.details:
Incorporated in 2005, Purv Flexipack Limited distributes plastic products, including BOPP film, Polyester Films, CPP films, Plastic granules, Inks, Adhesives, Masterbatches, Ethyl Acedate, and Titanium Dioxide.

The product portfolio of the company comprises Plastic Granules, Biaxially oriented polypropylene (BOPP) Films, HS BOPP, Matt BOPP, Glossy / Plain / Printing Grade BOPP, Tape and Textile BOPP, Pearlized, BOPP, Polyester Films, Cast Polypropylene (CPP) Films

The company provides various packaging solutions for a diverse customer base. They have four warehouses for storing and managing inventory. The warehouse is equipped with modern facilities and equipment to ensure safe and secure storage of products. It is maintained under optimal conditions to preserve the quality and integrity of the stored items. Also, the company has implemented strict inventory management systems to ensure accurate inventory tracking.

As of December 31, 2023, the company has 28 employees in various departments including Accounts & Finance, Compliance, Maintenance, Marketing & Logistics, Production & Operations, Quality, Top Level Management, and Permanent Labour.

faqs.question: What is the Purv Flexipack IPO?
faqs.answer:
Purv Flexipack IPO is a SME IPO of 5664000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹40.21 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹71 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on February 27, 2024, and closes on February 29, 2024.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Purv Flexipack IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Purv Flexipack IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Purv Flexipack IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Purv Flexipack IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Purv Flexipack IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Purv Flexipack IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Purv Flexipack IPO opens on February 27, 2024 and closes on February 29, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Purv Flexipack IPO?
faqs.answer: Purv Flexipack IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,13,600.

faqs.question: How to apply for Purv Flexipack IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Purv Flexipack IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Purv Flexipack IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Purv Flexipack IPO will be done on Friday, March 1, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Monday, March 4, 2024. Check the Purv Flexipack IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Purv Flexipack IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Purv Flexipack IPO listing date is on Tuesday, March 5, 2024.
